title: Ranked demote?
body:
Is it normal for me to demote straight to bronze 5 from one game???
I was playing flex queue, and I was bronze 2 with 72 lp right? Then after one game of ranked, I fell quickly down to bronze 5???

replies.body:
There is some more context on the change here: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/XMZm8OPI-ranked-corrections-to-placement-results-and-ranks

But basically, you should not have been placed in B2 to begin with, the original placements and matchmaking were completely messed up. You will almost always be placed lower than your end of season rank, so B5 is the usual placement for those ending a season in B4.
